summary: Email correspondence between U.S. Attorney's Office personnel regarding updates on a noon filing and a photos issue, with an attached PDF submission. The sender sets up an Outlook rule to forward bounce notifications automatically.

events.title: Email exchange regarding case updates
events.description: Email correspondence discussing updates on a noon filing and a photos issue, with an attached PDF submission and setup of an Outlook rule for bounce notifications.

locations: United States Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York
keyFacts: Email dated July 17, 2019, regarding updates on a noon filing and a photos issue.
An attached PDF submission is referenced, but no details on the photos are provided.
The sender sets up an Outlook rule to forward bounce notifications automatically to recipients.
The correspondence involves the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
